Title: Relates to the definition of prevailing market price and to preferred source subcontracts
Summary: Relates to the definition of prevailing market price and to preferred source subcontracts; authorizes a preferred source to subcontract an incidental portion of a contract to a vendor that is or is not a preferred source, provided that such subcontract does not diminish bona fide employment opportunities for persons who could otherwise be new clients of an entity previously accorded preferred source status.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to the definition of prevailing market price and in relation to preferred source subcontracts
